title: Susan Reid mortified as Piers Morgan asks: ‘Have you had sex in Pizza Express?’
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Good Morning Britain and Piers Morgan in particular are definitely not adverse to tackling controversial topics head on. But even Susanna Reid may have reached her limit this morning when Piers asked viewers if they’d had sex in Pizza Express.

This was, of course, all in the effort to aid the struggling food firm, which many fear is about to fold amid urgent talks with creditors.

The former Britain’s Got Talent judge seemed to take the news badly, openly lamenting the business’ fate and pleading with viewers to help him save the Italian food chain.

Piers is not happy about Pizza Express possibly folding (Picture: ITV/REX)

‘We can’t let Pizza Express go under,’ he pleaded. ‘Please, tell me your stories. Did you fall in love in Pizza Express? Did you get divorced in Pizza Express? Did you have a fight in Pizza Express?’

Things took a turn for the worst when Piers made another bizarre request, asking audience members to relay intimate acts they may have performed in the restaurant.

‘Did you have sex in Pizza Express?’ Piers asked, giggling as co-host Susanna looked on even more mortified than usual. The former newspaper editor couldn’t resist taking the joke even further, though.

‘Let’s not bring Boris into it,’ he added with a smirk.

Susanna Reid was shocked to say the least at Piers’ latest outburst (Picture: ITV/REX)

‘Piers…’ Susanna groaned after the X-rated question. ‘[It’s] always up to the line…and Piers is over it!’

This comes less than 24 hours after Piers and Susanna interviewed Jennifer Arcuri on the show yesterday. During the grilling, the model and businesswoman refused to confirm claims that she had slept with the Prime Minister.

Speaking of takeaways, however, the GMB also welcomed this morning a man who lost 20 stone after being ‘fat-shamed’.

Good Morning Britain airs weekdays from 6.30am on ITV.
